item.title: NEET UG 2025 Application Form: Required Documents and Information
item.description:
To successfully complete the NEET UG 2025 application form, ensure you have the following documents and information ready:

1- Personal Details:

  • Full name (as per official records)
  • Date of birth
  • Gender
  • Nationality
  • Category (General, OBC, SC, ST, etc.)
  • Identification details (Aadhaar number, passport number, or any valid government ID)

2- Contact Information:

  • Valid mobile number
  • Active email address
  • Permanent and correspondence addresses

3- Academic Qualifications:

  • Class 10 and 12 mark sheets
  • Passing certificates
  • School details (name, address, board)

4- Scanned Images for Upload:

  • Photograph: Recent color photograph with a white background
  • Format: JPG/JPEG
  • Size: 10 KB to 200 KB
  • Postcard-sized Photograph: Size: 4" x 6"
  • Size: 50 KB to 300 KB

5- Signature:

  • Clear signature on white paper with black ink
  • Format: JPG/JPEG
  • Size: 4 KB to 30 KB

6- Left and Right Hand Thumb Impressions:

  • Impressions on white paper with blue ink
  • Format: JPG/JPEG
  • Size: 10 KB to 50 KB

7- Additional Certificates (if applicable):

  • Category certificate (SC/ST/OBC/EWS)
  • PwBD certificate
  • Citizenship certificate or Embassy certificate for NRI/OCI candidates

8- Payment Details:

  • Credit/Debit card, Net Banking, or UPI details

item.title: NEET 2025 Exam Date and Important Information
item.description:
NEET 2025 will be held on 4th May 2025.
The exam duration is 180 minutes from 2 PM to 5 PM.
Submission of application forms is open from 7th Feb to 7th Mar.
No correction facility will be provided after registration.
Extra time will not be given for filling out the OMR sheet.
Be extremely careful while filling out the application form.
NTA is ensuring strict regulations this year.

item.title: PYQ's for NEET and JEE
item.description:
Complete Exam List

  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 2 (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 3 (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 4 (2024)

JEE Main 2024 (Online) Exams

  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 1st February Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 1st February Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 31st January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 31st January Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 30th January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 30th January Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 29th January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 29th January Morning Shift (2024)

JEE Advanced 2023-2014

  • JEE Advanced 2023 Paper 2 Online (2023)
  • JEE Advanced 2023 Paper 1 Online (2023)
  • JEE Advanced 2022 Paper 2 Online (2022)
  • JEE Advanced 2022 Paper 1 Online (2022)
  • JEE Advanced 2021 Paper 2 Online (2021)

NEET Exams

  • NEET 2023 (2023)
  • NEET 2022 Phase 2 (2022)
  • NEET 2021 (2021)
  • NEET 2020 Phase 1 (2020)

BITSAT Exams

  • BITSAT 2021 (2021)
  • BITSAT 2020 (2020)

AIEEE Exams

  • AIEEE 2012 (2012)
  • AIEEE 2011 (2011)
  • AIEEE 2010 (2010)
  • AIEEE 2009 (2009)
